errors.scholarship.cant.initiate.message: You cannot offer a scholarship to this player because they have not signed up on the platform or do no have the player role

errors.scholarship.cant.cancelactive.message: You cannot cancel an active scholarship before the sponsorship period

errors.scholarship.cant.cancelcancelled.message: You cannot cancel an already cancelled scholarship

errors.scholarship.cant.acceptoffer.message: You are unable to accept this scholarship offer

errors.scholarship.not.participant.message: You are unable to carry out this action because you are not a participant in this scholarship offer

errors.scholarship.cant.initiate.concurr.message: You are unable to initiate a new offer because you already have an ongoing offer with this user

errors.scholarship.player.alreadysponsor.message: You are unable to initiate a new offer because this player is already sponsored

errors.scholarship.alreadysponsored.message: You are unable to accept this offer because you are sponsored

errors.player.doesnotexist.ingame.message: This Player wallet isn't linked to any NFTWorlds account ingame
